bluestsdk_v2.changelog:
V2.0.0 / 07-Mar-2023 -> NFC communication management for provisioning and datalogging; low power strategies implementation; state machine update; in-application bootloader upgrade; bugfix on application examples
V1.1.0 / 03-Jun-2022 -> Firmware package compatible with CubeMX CMSIS pack structure
V1.0.1 / 09-May-2022 -> Bugfix on temperature reading, GNSS and power management data acquisition and LoRa configuration

bluestsdk_v2.fw_desc: The FP-SNS-FLIGHT1 is an STM32Cube function pack, which lets your IoT node connect to a smartphone via BLE and uses a suitable Android™ or iOS™ application like the STBLESensor app to view real-time object distance data read by the Time-of-Flight sensor.

Fast FOTA, BlueST SDK v2

bluestsdk_v2.changelog:
ATTENTION: firmware update for Nucleo boards is only available when using expansion IKS01A3.

Source Code Refactoring according to STM32CubeMX code generation using .ioc file; Added header license neutral; Added license files; Updated X-CUBE-MEMS1 Firmware Package
bluestsdk_v2.fw_desc: STM32 ODE function pack for IoT node with BLE connectivity, digital microphone, environmental and motion sensors

bluestsdk_v2.changelog: Maintenance release; STM32Cube middleware and HAL drivers update; code rebasing on latest available X-CUBEs; IDEs update;
bluestsdk_v2.fw_desc: candidate release

bluestsdk_v2.changelog: BlueST SDK v2
bluestsdk_v2.fw_desc: Example on how to send Sensors values and Motion Libraries output to ST BLE Sensor Application

bluestsdk_v2.changelog: Bugfixes
bluestsdk_v2.fw_desc: The FP-SNS-FLIGHT1 is an STM32Cube function pack, which lets your IoT node connect to a smartphone via BLE and uses a suitable Android™ or iOS™ application like the STBLESensor app to view real-time object distance data read by the Time-of-Flight sensor.

bluestsdk_v2.changelog: Added some parameters setting for STM32CubeMX
bluestsdk_v2.fw_desc: The FP-SNS-FLIGHT1 is an STM32Cube function pack, which lets your IoT node connect to a smartphone via BLE and uses a suitable Android™ or iOS™ application like the STBLESensor app to view real-time object distance data read by the Time-of-Flight sensor.

bluestsdk_v2.changelog: Documentation files update
